#summary Building from Source

Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:
{{{
svn checkout http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ gtkjfilechooser-read-only
}}}

Run the follow ant target to create a distributable zip with a demo:
{{{
ant dist
}}}

If you only want the the jar, this ant command is enough:
{{{
ant clean jar
}}}

Note that the source is an Eclipse project ready to be imported into your workspace without any external dependencies.
